Package game

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
city.cs.engine.Walker
game.Ball
public class Ball extends city.cs.engine.Walker
The Ball class extends the Walker class and represents a ball in the game. It has different modes and properties like health, speed, and position.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sujit Bhatta, sujit.bhatta@city.ac.uk

    The Mode enum represents the different modes a ball can have.

      public Ball(city.cs.engine.World world, float x_pos, float y_pos)
      Constructs a new ball object.
      Parameters:
      world - The world in which the ball exists.
      x_pos - The initial x position of the ball.
      y_pos - The initial y position of the ball.

    • setImage

      public void setImage(city.cs.engine.BodyImage image)
      Sets the image of the ball. It first removes previous ball image and then adds the new image.
      Parameters:
      image - The new image of the ball.

    • setBallFriction

      public void setBallFriction(float setFriction)
      Sets the friction of the ball. Used to add less or more friction on ball depending on its mode.
      Parameters:
      setFriction - The new friction of the ball.
